about.title: About Daily Wisdom
about.subtitle: A minimalist publication delivering daily wisdom through AI-generated articles on Philosophy, Science, and History.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: In a world overflowing with information, Daily Wisdom offers a moment of clarity. Each day, we deliver a article exploring timeless topics in philosophy, science, and history. Our goal is to provide accessible, thought-provoking content that enriches your understanding of the world and inspires deeper reflection.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.intro: Daily Wisdom uses advanced artificial intelligence to generate fresh, insightful content every day:
howItWorks.aiGenerationDesc: Articles are created using Google's Gemini AI, which researches topics and synthesizes information from multiple sources.
howItWorks.sourceCitationsDesc: Every article includes references to credible sources, grounded in real information from Google Search.
howItWorks.availabilityDesc: Content is automatically generated at midnight UTC, ensuring fresh wisdom is ready when you start your day.

worldwide.title: Available Worldwide
worldwide.content: Daily Wisdom is available in 12 languages, making wisdom accessible to readers around the globe. Our hybrid translation system combines DeepL's high-quality translations with AI-powered fallback to ensure content is available in:

technology.title: Built with Modern Technology
technology.content: Daily Wisdom is built with cutting-edge web technologies to ensure a fast, reliable, and beautiful reading experience:

futurePlans.title: Future Plans
futurePlans.intro: We're constantly working to improve Daily Wisdom and add new features to enhance your reading experience. Here's what we're planning:
futurePlans.articleSearchDesc: Browse through the archive of past articles with powerful search functionality to find specific topics or themes that interest you.
futurePlans.categoriesDesc: Organize articles into categories like humor, quick passages, deep dives, and more, making it easier to find content that matches your mood.
futurePlans.userAccountsDesc: Create a personal account to save your favorite articles, add private notes, and track your reading history.
futurePlans.inDepthAnalysisDesc: Select any passage from an article to receive detailed explanations, historical context, or deeper philosophical analysis.
futurePlans.suggestions: Have ideas for other features? We'd love to hear your suggestions!

aiDisclaimer.title: Important:
aiDisclaimer.content: All articles on Daily Wisdom are generated by artificial intelligence. While we strive for accuracy and cite credible sources, AI-generated content may contain errors or inaccuracies. Always verify important information from primary sources.

openSource.title: Open Source & Support
openSource.content: Daily Wisdom is an open-source project, built with passion and shared freely with the community. The entire codebase is available on GitHub under the MIT License.
openSource.supportText: If you find Daily Wisdom valuable, consider supporting its development. Your sponsorship helps keep the project alive and enables continued improvements.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.content: Have questions, suggestions, or feedback? I'd love to hear from you.
